Constructor Detail

ElGamalKeyParametersPequals2Qplus1

public ElGamalKeyParametersPequals2Qplus1(java.math.BigInteger p,
                                          java.math.BigInteger q,
                                          java.math.BigInteger g)
Create key parameters from the given parameters.

Parameters:
p - safe prime p = 2*q + 1
q - prime number q which defines the order of the generator g
g - generator of a q-order subgroup of Z*_p
Throws:
java.security.InvalidParameterException - if parameters do not match the specifications

ElGamalKeyParametersPequals2Qplus1

public ElGamalKeyParametersPequals2Qplus1(int keySize,
                                          java.util.Random r)
Create key parameters for the requested key size.

Parameters:
keySize - maximum supported key size in bits (defines the length of q)
random - randomness source
Throws:
java.security.InvalidParameterException - if keySize < MINIMUM_KEY_SIZE8.

ElGamalKeyParametersPequals2Qplus1

public ElGamalKeyParametersPequals2Qplus1(int keySize,
                                          java.math.BigInteger baseZpGeneratorSearch,
                                          java.util.Random r)
Create key parameters for the requested key size.

Parameters:
keySize - maximum supported key size in bits (defines the length of q)
baseZpGeneratorSearch - defines the value used to start the search for a generator of Z_p which is then used to set g, the Z*_q generator
random - randomness source
Throws:
java.security.InvalidParameterException - if keySize < MINIMUM_KEY_SIZE, or baseZpGenerator length >= keySize.

Randomly creates the key parameters for a given keySize

Parameters:
keySize - maximum supported key size in bits (defines the length of q)
random - randomness source
Returns:
BigIntege[] with the p and q parameters

getQOrderGenerator

public final java.math.BigInteger getQOrderGenerator(java.math.BigInteger startSearch)
Create a q-order generator of Z*_p

Parameters:
startSearch - sets the start point for the initial Z*_p generator search
Returns:
returns the first q-order generator ( > startSearch^2) of Z*_p

getZpGenerator

private final java.math.BigInteger getZpGenerator()
Get the generator of Z_p that originated g;

Returns:
k = squareRoot(this.g) a generator of Z_p
